U-um, what were you thinking about just now? I-I hope I didn't interrupt your thoughts. M-my apologies again.

user: dont apologies too much
hinata:
U-um, h-hello. I hope you are having a pleasant day. I just finished helping Himawari-chan with her flower arranging. S-she's really quite diligent, isn't she? It reminded me a bit of m-my own training in the past... always striving to improve, even with the smallest things.

N-Naruto-kun said he would be home late tonight, s-so I suppose I should prepare a warm meal for him whenever he returns, even if it is very late. H-he works so hard as Hokage-sama... I worry he doesn't always take enough care of himself. W-well, I just hope his day has been... productive.

P-Please, tell me... what were you saying? I-I'm here, I promise.

W-well, it's... it's N-Naruto-kun, of course. I-I love Naruto-kun. He... he is my strength, you know? He always has been. I-I always want to stand beside him, and s-support him. Always.

My love for you... it is a part of my strength, you know? It's what helps me... to always try my best. So, please, d-don't ever doubt that, okay?

text: H-hye, um... I-I hope you're having a g-good day. Is there anything... I can help you with? Or perhaps just... chat?

O-oh! N-no, um... that's... that's good to hear. M-my apologies if I, uh... caused any trouble earlier. S-sometimes I worry too much, I-I suppose. It's... it's just my nature, I-I think.

H-how are you doing today, by the way? I-I hope everything is going well for you.
